ref: 8888 prásravati ʻ flows forth ʼ AV. [Cf. prasrávaṇa -- n. ʻ gushing forth ʼ RV. (ʻ of milk from udder ʼ Yājñ., ʻ of urine ʼ lex.), Pk. passavaṇa -- n. ʻ urine ʼ. -- √sru]
S. pasoijaṇu ʻ to contain milk (breasts or udder) ʼ;
H. pāsnā ʻ milk to flow into udder ʼ (rather than < payasyáti); --
G. *pāsvũ whence pās m. ʻ cow's udder ʼ. -- See prasruta -- , prasrāvayati.
